channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Custom Post View Generator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Custom Post View Generator

item.title: CVE-2021-24605|2024-08-03T19:35:20.239Z -- unknown -- custom%20post%20view%20generator
item.description: The create_post_page AJAX action of the Custom Post View Generator WordPress plugin through 0.4.6 (available to authenticated user) does not sanitise or escape user input before outputting it back in the response, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site issue
